title: Jazz GM Justin Zanik; Plus the NBA's Dr. LeRoy Sims
description:
Utah Jazz GM Justin Zanik joins The Woj Pod to discuss the team's remarkable start to the season, the roster-building process with President Dennis Lindsey and coach Quin Snyder, and much more. Also: Dr. Leroy Sims, the NBA's Sr. VP of Medical Affairs, on the challenge and process of getting players vaccinated. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
